FundApps | CTO | Full-time | London, UK | Onsite

I'm looking for a new CTO to take over the reins from me and lead FundApps through our next stage of growth. It’s been an epic ride, but now looking for someone with more experience of leading a growing technology team.

We’re delivering a cloud based service in a complex domain with a need for exceptional accuracy, security & availability in an industry that continues to be ripe for disruption. No shortage of scaling and product opportunities to tackle on the horizon!

We have a global client list of leading financial institutions, offices in London and New York, plus some fully remote staff.

If you might be interested in taking a hot ‘regtech’ business to the next level, drop me a line (james@fundapps.co) and we can chat more.

More here: https://fundapps.workable.com/j/54970B21B0
